name: Shellfish
description:
You play as the golden retriever-snapping turtle-chicken, Goldie. She dreams of going to the moon. The launch date is approaching and funds are tight. Will you be able to make it?

Meet characters such as the donkey-monkey-chameleon, Coco! And the snail-frog-goat, Snips!

Play mini games!

Reach your goal and realise your dreams!

Emotional story line that teaches you about LIFE!

PLEASE PLAY WITH GRAPHIC SETTING ULTRA!
